message: Citizen training is especially important in preventing and stopping human trafficking, said Santoro. “At the end of the day, the majority of the tips that we’re getting on human trafficking are not coming from law enforcement.  They’re coming from you all. #Education

data.description: Judge Kim Chaney, left, presents Scott Santoro with the Department of Homeland Security a few tokens of appreciation for his work this week in Cullman County. / Andrew Cryer
data.title: Public class wraps up week of human trafficking awareness training
